Package library.persistence.implementation

Class DatabaseAdapter

java.lang.Object
library.persistence.implementation.DatabaseAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Adapter
public class DatabaseAdapter extends Object implements Adapter
The DatabaseAdapter implements the interface Adapter. The Adapter is accessed from the GUI in order to retrieve data from the database. The Adapter creates an instance of the chosen implemented Factory class, which returns the specific service. With the help of the service, data from the database is retrieved and converted into the model types which are used in the GUI.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseAdapter

      public DatabaseAdapter()
      The constructor initiates the service with the help of the factory. Database lists are generated and filled with current database entries. Then the database objects are converted into the model objects.
